trans-unit.source: Implements a double-buffered <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> that can split reading and writing to different threads.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlBackgroundReader"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlBackgroundReader"></xref> is based on.
wrappedReader is .
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlBackgroundReader"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
In addition to calling the base implementation, this `Dispose` implementation disposes related writers and event handlers.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed resources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that specifies whether line information is available.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line information is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that reports whether the reader position is at end-of-file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the position is at end-of-file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the line number to report.
The line number to report.
Gets the line position to report.
The line position to report.
Gets the current member at the reader position, if the reader position is on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref>.
The current member; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the position is not on a member.
Gets the XAML namespace from the current node.
The XAML namespace, if it is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets the type of the current node.
A value of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> enumeration.
Provides the next XAML node from the source, if a node is available.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a node is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that provides schema context information for the information set.
An object that provides schema context information for the information set.

Creates and starts a new <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> (constructed from <xref href="System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart"></xref>) that handles a named thread for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref>.
By default, the thread is named `XAML reader thread`.
The thread is already started.

Creates and starts a new <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> (constructed from <xref href="System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart"></xref>) that handles a named thread for the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref>.
You specify the thread name as a parameter.
The name for the thread.
The thread is already started.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the current node.
The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the current node; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the current reader position is not on an object.
Gets the value of the current node.
The value of the current node; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the current reader position is not on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> node type.
